statements: DELETE FROM project_progress WHERE due_date < '2022-12-31' AND assigned_to = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM task_assignments WHERE task_id = 101 AND assigned_to = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM TaskAssignments WHERE task_id = 100 AND completion_status = false;
DELETE FROM Deadlines WHERE project_id = 3 AND deadline_name = 'Report Submission';
DELETE FROM Deadlines WHERE deadline_name = 'Project Deadline' AND is_completed = FALSE;
DELETE FROM progress_updates WHERE task_id = (SELECT task_id FROM tasks WHERE task_name = 'Review Proposal');
